reviewText: This movie could have easily gone awry and turned into a cruel, stereotype-filled joke.  Instead, all involved - cast and crew - managed to create a film that both portrayed immense sensitivity and conveyed innate beauty. One identifies with the leads while feeling pity for even the most unsympathetic characters. Primarily, the story succeeded in vividly showing that, although we may run from our circumstances, we are never able to escape ourselves.

A touching film. This film shows the journey of an Australian woman's flight from herself into the exotic world of Bali and ultimately back to herself. Incredible Imagery! Beautiful! John Lone's role shows him at his best.
